casebody.data:
The State, ex rel. Murr, Appellant, v. Alexander et al., Appellees.

[Cite as State, ex rel. Murr, v. Alexander (1988), 37 Ohio St. 3d 243.]

No. 88-528 Submitted May 17, 1988 Decided June 29, 1988. Jeffrey A. Murr, pro se. Anthony J. Celebrezze, Jr., attorney general, and Bennett A. Manning, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed because the matter is moot.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Locher, Holmes, Douglas, Wright and H. Brown, JJ., concur.
